title: Refer-A-Friend for Oceania Server

embed.description: League of Legends is a team game, and your best friends make the best teammates. We've updated the Refer-a-Friend programing to thank you for bringing your friends into League. Log in and invite your friends today!

body:
Hello everyone,
The link above is the description about the new Refer-A-Friend system in the NA server.While there are new updates for this system on NA server it is sad to see that OCE doesnt even have the former Refer-A-Friend system.  I think its unfair that summoners in certain servers get recognized for bringing their friends to play this amazing game while some summoners dont. I think its about time to bring the Refer-A-Friend system to the OCE server .

replies.body:
This is something we are working on.  The updated version of Refer a Friend launched last week in other regions, and we are putting the finishing touches on for Oceania.   There are a few extra steps to do, since Oceania didn't have Refer a Friend before, but we should have some news for you soon ;)

Cheers

-Mindstar
